---
title: "ERDM NADM"
author: "Daniel O'Leary"
date: "5/6/2020"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
erdm_nadm_demog <-
  asa_24_total %>% 
  mutate(subid = subid.x) %>% 
  filter(KCAL > 1000) %>% 
  dplyr::select(
    subid,
    age,
    gender
  ) %>% 
  distinct()
```

```{r}
erdm_nadm_demog %>% 
  count(gender)

erdm_nadm_demog %>% 
  summarise(
    m_age = mean(age, na.rm = TRUE),
    sd_age = sd(age, na.rm = TRUE)
  )
```
